row.process:
:ATTACH_RES "STORE.ASO.NETSCALER.PLINK", "*", C
echo "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#plink.exe" -ssh -pw &NETSCALER_PASSWORD# &NETSCALER_USERNAME#@&TARGET_NETSCALER# show cs vserver &NETSCALER_CSVS_DCP# :BEGIN_EXT_INT PLINK_NETSCALER show cs vserver &NETSCALER_CSVS_DCP# :END_EXT_INT PLINK_NETSCALER
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

row.pre_process:
:INC JOBI.ASO.SHAREPOINT.PEP_SHAREPOINT
!set attribut host :PUT_ATT HOST = '&HOST_NETSCALER#' ! !set attribut login for OS-Agent :PUT_ATT LOGIN = 'LOGIN.DEFAUT' :SET &CONN_USER# = GET_ATT(USERID)!

row.post_process:
! :define &PRIORITY_DCP#, unsigned ! :define &VALUE#, string :IF &ENVIRONNEMENT# = "PRD" : SET &HND1# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Policy: CS_POL*", "COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER=*: *") : PROCESS &HND1# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#, 4) : SET &VALUE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&VALUE#, "Hits", "") : SET &LONG_VALUE# = STR_LENGTH(&VALUE#) : SET &LONG_VALUE# = SUB(&LONG_VALUE#, 1) : SET &VALUE# = STR_CUT(&VALUE#, 1, &LONG_VALUE#) : PRINT "Current VALUE = -&VALUE#-" : ENDPROCESS
: PSET &PRIORITY_DCP# = CONVERT(unsigned, &VALUE#) : PSET &PRIORITY_DCP# = FORMAT(&PRIORITY_DCP#, "0") : PRINT "Final Last priority = &PRIORITY_DCP#" : SET &RESULT_TMP# = DIV(&PRIORITY_DCP#,10) : pset &PRIORITY_DCP# = mult(&RESULT_TMP#,10) : PSET &PRIORITY_DCP# = ADD(&PRIORITY_DCP#, 10) : PSET &PRIORITY_DCP# = FORMAT(&PRIORITY_DCP#, "0") : PRINT "Next priority = &PRIORITY_DCP#"
!: PUT_VAR_COL VARA.ASO.SHAREPOINT_PEP@FROM_TICKET, "PRIORITY_DCP#", 1, &PRIORITY_DCP# :ELSE : SET &HND1# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "*Content-Switching Policy*", "COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER=*: *") : PROCESS &HND1# : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#, 4) : SET &VALUE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&VALUE#, "Hits", "") : SET &LONG_VALUE# = STR_LENGTH(&VALUE#) : SET &LONG_VALUE# = SUB(&LONG_VALUE#, 1) : SET &VALUE# = STR_CUT(&VALUE#, 1, &LONG_VALUE#) : PRINT "Current VALUE = -&VALUE#-" : ENDPROCESS
: PSET &PRIORITY_DCP# = CONVERT(unsigned, &VALUE#) : PSET &PRIORITY_DCP# = FORMAT(&PRIORITY_DCP#, "0") : PRINT "Final Last priority = &PRIORITY_DCP#" : SET &RESULT_TMP# = DIV(&PRIORITY_DCP#,10) : pset &PRIORITY_DCP# = mult(&RESULT_TMP#,10) : PSET &PRIORITY_DCP# = ADD(&PRIORITY_DCP#, 10) : PSET &PRIORITY_DCP# = FORMAT(&PRIORITY_DCP#, "0") : PRINT "Next priority = &PRIORITY_DCP#" !: PUT_VAR_COL VARA.ASO.SHAREPOINT_PEP@FROM_TICKET, "PRIORITY_DCP#", 1, &PRIORITY_DCP# :ENDIF
